title: Most uncomfortable room I've ever stayed in.
text:
Probably the WORST room I've ever stayed in, Stylish but lacks basic things a hotel room should have.... like Comfort! There's none of that.
First, there's no air in the room. So, don't even think about relaxing or cooling off. It's like a sauna in here. Have the thermostat sat to 64. But, it feels like 164. Yes, I can crack the window open- then it's a giant wind tunnel, since we're high up and it's like 20 degrees out.
The bed is as hard as a rock and the pillows are non-existent. Very flat, lifeless pillows that are impossible relax on. Also, I might get more comfort out of laying on the concrete outside than this bed.
I highly recommend not staying here. It is so bad, they really should give me a refund. It's unbearable. I am a Hyatt Platnium member, or whatever the new program calls me now and I really am thinking of bringing my loyalty else where.
